ggheat.continuous()

ggheat.continuous helper function for plotting ggheatmap, see ggheat.continuous.single and ggheat.continuous.group for examples of usage

ggheat.continuous.group()

ggheat.continuous.group ggheatmap function for plotting groups of esets, within-group column clustering

ggheat.continuous.single()

ggheat.continuous.single ggheatmap function for plotting a single eset

ggheat.make.groups()

ggheat.make.groups splits eset into list of esets based on phenotype label, do clustering within groups
